Common LanguageÂ¶

This entire Quality Assurance Manual has been prepared in accordance with ISO 9001/ Quality Management and Part M as specified is in the English language. Should it become necessary for AC Aviation to produce a new Quality Assurance Manual or major parts of the Quality Assurance Manual, it will be prepared in the English language.

ACA understands that with the approval of the Authority we may translate and use the manual or parts thereof, into another language to ensure that that all personnel are able to understand parts of the QAM that pertain to their duties and responsibilities.
